id_connections.custom_query_string: SELECT guid, country, full_name, street_address, email FROM identities where country_code != 'US'
id_connections.name: Customers Identities

id_connections.custom_query_string: SELECT guid, state, full_name, street_address, email FROM identities where country_code = 'US'
id_connections.name: Employee Identities

id_connections.custom_query_string: SELECT street_address, email, user_id, last_name, first_name, university, post_code, country, race, gender, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM users
id_connections.name: Lineage

id_connections.custom_query_string: SELECT name, customer_id, 'GBR' AS residency FROM customers
id_connections.name: Insurance Customers

id_connections.custom_query_string: SELECT policy_number, CONCAT(policy_number, " (", REPLACE(policy_type, "_", " "), ")") AS policy_display_name, 'GBR' AS residency FROM policies
id_connections.name: Insurance Policies

id_connections.custom_query_string: SELECT customer_id, name, 'GBR' AS residency FROM inactive_customers
id_connections.name: Insurance Expired Customers
